remarks: If an integral domain has a primitive ` N ` -th root of unity, it has exactly ` ( phi `` N ) ` of them.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Sep-2015.)
statement:
proot1hash.g $e |- G = ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s ( Unit ` R ) ) $.
proot1hash.o $e |- O = ( od ` G ) $.
proot1hash $p |- ( ( R e. IDomn /\ N e. NN /\ X e. ( `' O " { N } ) ) -> ( # ` ( `' O " { N } ) ) = ( phi ` N ) ) $.
